title: Publish v1.0.0 to npm
description:
Publish the v1.0.0 release to npm.

Prerequisites:
- All tests pass
- Test in minimal-nuxt-ui-app successful
- User has given explicit approval

Steps:
1. pnpm publish
2. Verify on npmjs.com
3. git push --follow-tags

CRITICAL: Only do this with explicit user permission per CLAUDE.md
